message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us.
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it!
Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  Agree to this and we both walk away with something.
Your 50/50 split sounds nice, but I think I can do better!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a majority share.  Don't be greedy, let's end this now before we both lose out.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But I'm not backing down!
